heroContent.title: Take a Dip!
heroContent.content: Mix Trader Joe's Almond Chipotle Dip with a couple simple ingredients to create a smooth, smoky, spicy salad dressing that'll boost your BBQ side salads this holiday weekend!
heroContent.imageAltText: Trader Joe's Almond Chipotle Dip shown in recipe for Almond Chipotle Salad Dressing; black surface with bowl of chopped salad, avocado slices and lime topped with Almond Chipotle Dressing; limes, parsley garnish
